thread.section_title: Hotel Villa Saxe Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing Hotel!!
thread.title_full: Amazing Hotel!! - Review of Hotel Villa Saxe Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Gatton-Guy
title: Amazing Hotel!!
text:
This is a beautiful off the beaten track gem of a hotel.
I took my partner to Paris for her birthday and the staff at the hotel made us feel welcome from the second we arrived. Nothing felt like it was to much trouble. We were upgraded for free to one of the best rooms in the hotel and it was an amazing room. The bed was AMAZINGLY comfortable especially for someone 6'4 who is used to his feet sticking out the end of the bed lol.
When I return to Paris I will only stay at this hotel as it's head and shoulders above other hotels in Paris.
